# autoglue_cluster_control_plane_record_set (Resource)

Attaches a control-plane record set to a cluster.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) Cluster ID.
- `record_set_id` (String) Record set ID to attach as control-plane record set.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Synthetic ID, equal to cluster_id.
